text: Richard Samuel Nemelka (October 1, 1943 â€“ September 19, 2020) was an American professional basketball player for the American Basketball Association (ABA). He was born in Salt Lake City, Utah. As a college player, he earned All- American honor at Brigham Young University (BYU). He played for the Utah Stars between 1970 to 1971. Nemelka died on September 19, 2020 in Salt Lake City from cancer, aged 76. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Cancer deaths in Utah Category:Lawyers from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from Salt Lake City, Utah
title: Dick Nemelka
